content.prompt: In context, Time’s words in lines 3-6 (“No marvel . . . find it”) are ambiguous because Time suggests that the “blame” comes from both

choices.label: those who wish for death and those who do not welcome their own death
those who live long lives and those for whom death arrives sooner than expected
those who comprehend the finality of death and those who are unable to admit its reality
those who fault others for their problems and those who accept responsibility for their actions

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain the function of specific words and phrases in a text.
